# iosxr_mpls_ldp_interface (Resource)

This resource can manage the MPLS LDP Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_mpls_ldp_interface" "example" {
  interface_name                 = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
  discovery_hello_holdtime       = 30
  discovery_hello_interval       = 3
  discovery_hello_dual_stack_tlv = "ipv4"
  discovery_quick_start_disable  = true
  igp_sync_delay_on_session_up   = 20
  address_family = [
    {
      af_name                        = "ipv4"
      discovery_transport_address_ip = "192.168.1.1"
      igp_auto_config_disable        = true
      mldp_disable                   = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface_name` (String) Enable LDP on an interface and enter interface submode

### Optional

- `address_family` (Attributes List) Configure Address Family and its parameters (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family))
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `discovery_hello_dual_stack_tlv` (String) Change AF preference in Dual Stack TLV
  - Choices: `ipv4`, `ipv6`
- `discovery_hello_holdtime` (Number) Hello holdtime
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `discovery_hello_interval` (Number) Hello interval
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `discovery_quick_start_disable` (Boolean) Disable quick discovery
- `igp_sync_delay_on_session_up` (Number) Interface sync-up delay (seconds)
  - Range: `5`-`300`
- `igp_sync_delay_on_session_up_disable` (Boolean) Disable

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--address_family"></a>
### Nested Schema for `address_family`

Required:

- `af_name` (String) Configure Address Family and its parameters
  - Choices: `ipv4`, `ipv6`

Optional:

- `discovery_transport_address_interface` (Boolean) Use this interface address as transport address
- `discovery_transport_address_ip` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `igp_auto_config_disable` (Boolean) Disable
- `mldp_disable` (Boolean) Disable mLDP on LDP enabled interface

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_mpls_ldp_interface.example "<interface_name>"
```
